title: Part B Respiratory

description: Tasks specific to Respiratory cohort ​

priority: routine

Actions

-PrefixTitleDescription
*B.1 Task 1Breath SoundsRelax until the task starts.“Take three deep breaths in a row in andout the mouth.”
*B.1 Task 2Voluntary cough“Breathe normally, then when you areready, cough HARD as if something werestuck in your throat.”Complete this three times.

title: Respiratory Cohort Protocol
description: This is a plandefinition for Respiratory cohort protocol

action.title: Required task across all chorts
action.description: List of tasks and actions done across all 5 cohorts

action.title: Urge to Cough Scale
action.description: Get the participant to rate their urge to cough

action.title: Breath Sounds
action.description: Relax until the task starts.“Take three deep breaths in a row in andout the mouth.”

action.title: Voluntary cough
action.description: “Breathe normally, then when you areready, cough HARD as if something werestuck in your throat.”Complete this three times.
